column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This place is very cute and beautifully designed. It was very busy when I visited and there was a line at the door. However
column2: it moved very quickly and service was great! There was a lot of delicious and well presented pastries and desserts. I wanted to try them all
column3: but decided to try that popular pistachio croissant I saw on yelp. That croissant was HUGE and DELICIOUS. There was a filling inside that tasted somewhat like mung beans. I also ordered the LOX and a lavender latte. Both are also good. Overall
column8: and great customer service. Nothing negative to say to be honest. Will definitely keep this place as a favorite when I come back in town.
